channel.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
channel.description:
Hi Axolotis
Is it possible to synchronise a tempo from a software to Axoloti to control (for example) an arpeggiatore ? In MIDI ? In USB ? If it's possible, what kind of object can I use in the patch ?
The software can be Max/msp, Reason or Live.
Thanks for help FloSan

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @FloSan
item.description:
@FloSan wrote:

Hi @Naviow,
Thanks for your help.
It works !
Have Fun

Read full topic

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @Naviow john
item.description:
@Naviow wrote:

Hi @FloSan

been staring at your patch for the last hour so.... I did lots of reading on the forum (its all there somewhere) and just added two objects to you patch and it now works on my setup.

Sync_Clock2.axp (6.4 KB)

I couldn't get the display object to work though ?

John

Read full topic

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @FloSan
item.description:
@FloSan wrote:

Hellon @Naviow and other,

I've a MIDI interface, this is not a problem.

I've anderstood that I have to use the object [midi/in/clock] in Axoloti software, but I don't understand how to link Axoloti to my software (in this case Reason).

I've done the patch below can you tel me if I'm on the good way.
Thanx for all

Sync_Clock.axp (5.7 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @Naviow john
item.description:
@Naviow wrote:

Hi FloSan,
I'm a newbie here as-well but I have midi clocked synced with Abelton via my audio interface which has midi out using an ordinary 5 pin midi cable, I used the midi in object.
I have also sync the Axoloti with my ipad & phone using a camera connection kit and one of theses cheap usb midi interfaces - works fine. (about Â£5 on Ebay)

I should add that the usb end goes to the computer or Ipad not the Axoloti

Read full topic

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @FloSan
item.description:
@FloSan wrote:

Hi Axolitis'

I've another question : Is it possible to sand midi clock from a software (Reason, Max/msp, Live) to axoloti ? If it's possible how can I do that ?

Thanx
FloSan

Read full topic

item.title: Synch Tempo to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @InvisibleMan
item.description:
@InvisibleMan wrote:

It can! Here are midi clock objects that perform precisely this function. I am still new to this process, but wanted to 1) encourage you, and 2) bump this thread for more answers.

Read full topic
